Hi, I'm Tom

I’m a researcher and editor.

I currently work at the Ada Lovelace Institute, researching how public bodies use AI to deliver public services, and investigative journalism initiative The Gecko Project, working on an investigation into palm oil companies in Indonesia.

Here are some of the projects I’ve worked on.

Technology for Legal Empowerment: A Global Review

Lead researcher - Open Society Justice Initiative

Continue reading Technology for Legal Empowerment: A Global Review

Humanitarian Futures for Messaging Apps

Lead researcher - International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC)

Continue reading Humanitarian Futures for Messaging Apps
